PSCT.Vegas:
① During the next Standby Phase after this card was destroyed by a card effect and sent to the GY:
Special Summon this card from the GY. 
② If you do: Destroy all other monsters on the field. 
③ If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Fire King" monster from your Deck (except "Fire King High Avatar Garunix").
